experience: Will you be one of the 92% who FAIL to achieve your goals for 2018? The 4th quarter is when businesses and organizations strategize and plan for the coming year. Those who don't plan, often fail. Treat your life and career like a business. Now is the time to plan and strategize your success for 2018.
Investing in green tech. and gold mines projects. Charities worldwide.
Helping The Planet Being Green Again
Helping The Planet Being Green Again

Revest & Partners can provide bridge and mezzanine loans, structured products and preferred equity for:• Joint-Venture Equity • Acquisitions Facilities• Recapitalization  • Distressed Acquisitions• Restructures • Borrower Discounted Payoffs• Value Added  • Non-performing Notes / REOsWe have a priority to deliver quality, service, design and installation at a cost-effective price and to provide a personalized and innovative service to fulfill our client’s specific requirements at all times. We strive to continually ensure that we maintain our name as an ethical and well respected business consultant and service provider.Our Goals and Objectives:To enable meaningful cuts in carbon emissions, and reduce dependence on unsustainable sources of energy.To fund and implement renewable energy and energy efficiency measures, in collaboration with people, communities and businesses.To work cooperatively with people and communities to make carbon reduction technologies available to all regardless of financial resources, and support mutual action to respond to the challenges of climate change.To provide a healthy financial return on investment, demonstrating long-term financial sustainability.We plan to support faster conversion to low-carbon living by:Securing investment from investors looking for strong social outcomes alongside financial return.Investing in renewable energy and energy efficiency infrastructure, either as a wholly owned, or on a pay-as-you-save basis.Reinvesting profits into further infrastructure.Visit www.revestpartners.org for more details.

Stellar Road Financial Group LLC is an effective and experienced global networking firm.  We have assets on every continent providing consulting and relationship building for governments as well as private companies. At Stellar Road Financial Group LLC, you benefit from a boutique organization with global resources and relationships with some of the largest and most respected financial firms in the world.  We create solutions that address your specific needs. We give our clients access to experts in trading, investments and private equity, for both long and short term needs.  We provide access to award winning research and short-term tactical funding opportunities.

5-star hotel with 200 rooms (under the direction of one of the leading international hotel operators). 76 luxury houses apartments (managed by one of the leading international brands of Luxury residences) and or 176 houses which is subject to purchaseadditional land of 230,000 m2.The hotel resort is situated on the Lake Insko with a private coastline of 500 –1000 meters (subject to purchase additional land of 230,000m2). In addition to the exclusive private shore line, the Resort complex outdoor pools, tennis courts, playgrounds, covered parking, and finally an outdoor amphitheater for Cultural events will be located.The hotel resort will also have bars, restaurants, and a conference center with an area of over 3,400 m2 to enable a variety of international events. International Airport is located about 40 km to the south west of the Resort complex.

Founded in 2003, Charms Investments is a leading U.S. based Advisory and Consulting Firm specializing in the reverse merger process. We advise our clients on strategic planning, corporate and securities law, SEC accounting, investor relations, capital raising and investment banking matters. Since 2003, Charms Investments has been involved in over 100 reverse mergers, serving as a catapult which facilitates commerce in the equity markets.

summary: “If you work just for money, you’ll never make it, but if you love what you’re doing and you always put employees first, success will be yours.” Walid is an ex-pro soccer player and a highly ambitious businessman.He excelled at young ages winning two times the trophy of best player in his city of birth,Sfax(Tunisia). At 16, Walid was selected to join his national team for Japan U-17 World Cup. He started his pro. career at the age of 20 working with a well known teams in Tunisia then his love to the sport takes him to US where he joined four teams in New York and Tennessee. Like most US immigrants,Walid debuts with handy jobs and experienced 35 workplaces between restaurants,painting,furnishing,selling phones and managing clothing stores before he went to Investment and created Lido,a small Investment firm which was into stocks,real estate and trading. As a request from his business partner in UK,he joined Revest & Partners and took a leading role on evaluating,negotiating,closing currencies deals and financing mega projects.Walid and his team are in process establishing Lido Global LLC,a billions of dollars worth Investment company with headquarter in Las Vegas and offices in Miami,L.A,Dubai and HK. Company is an extension of Lido focusing mainly on large scale gold mines,green energy and charities.Walid is a bachelor in Literature. He studied Economics and Finance at two Universities in Tunisia for four years. He is pursuing education on Global Strategic Management abroad.
name: Walid Ghribi
title: Chairman,Founder,Investor,Entrepreneur & Philanthropist at Lido Global LLC
